title: DevGrade: GitHub Profile Assessment Tool
description: DevGrade leverages GitHub activity to provide a comprehensive developer profile assessment. Generates a skill and potential grade, and offers embeddable badges (HTML/React) for showcasing verified credentials.

title: Reserve: Next.js Productivity Application
description: A full-stack productivity application engineered with Next.js 15. Features a clean UI, optimized performance, and intuitive scheduling functionalities to enhance user consistency.

title: DecisionDex: Visual Decision Analysis Platform
description: A decision-making platform enabling users to define priorities, enumerate options, and analyze choices through visual statistical representations. Empowers clarity for effective action.

title: Streaksvr: Personal Streak Tracking Application
description: An application designed for tracking and building personal streaks based on self-assigned tasks. Facilitates habit formation and personal challenge management.

title: Socially: Full-Stack Social Media Application
description: A comprehensive full-stack social media application featuring an explore feed, follower suggestions, liking and posting capabilities, and more social interactions.
